title: Infinite Deduction
alternative_title: Dedução Infinita ; Infinite Derivation ; Wúxiàn Tuīyǎn ; 予知能力でSSS級最強ハンターへ ; 无限推演 ; 無限推演
status: Dedução Infinita ; Infinite Derivation ; Wúxiàn Tuīyǎn ; 予知能力でSSS級最強ハンターへ ; 无限推演 ; 無限推演
description:
Description :
        In a blend of horror games and reality, the protagonist, a down-and-out young man named Xiao Hei, gains a golden finger that allows him to predict events in the next ten minutes, along with the ability to train and nurture supernatural beings. He embarks on battles of wits and bravery, fighting against monsters and exploring human nature, gaining growth along the way.
